dialog: Can it not be procured at a lesser price, my dear wizard?
Alas, this is the fairest of prices. No further reduction shall be made.
Very well then, might I be able to pay with wizarding traveler's drafts?
I'm afraid not, the payment in gold galleons is most preferred.
Do you have a moment to spare?
Of course, what can I assist you with?
I am having some trouble operating this dragon scale press.
Let me see, have you tried turning the fire-breathing knob?
Ah, yes, my apologies.
Now try pressing the dragon's tail button.
Oh dear, it seems to be out of dragon scales. Do you have any extra?
Just a moment, I'll go retrieve some for you.
I am in need of help with the broomstick dryer and washer.
What seems to be the issue?
I cannot seem to figure out how to turn them on.
Do you have any flimsy flying feathers?
I did not know I needed feathers.
The washer requires three feathers and the dryer requires five.
Where do I place the feathers?
Simply place the feathers in the slot, and the machines should activate.
